PSC.description: SPACE R&D SERVICES; SPACE FLIGHT, RESEARCH AND SUPPORTING ACTIVITIES; BASIC RESEARCH

results.Sub-Award Description: UNDER THE DIRECTION OF THE TRACERS PI, UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA BERKELEY WILL PERFORM THE ACTIVITIES LISTED BELOW DURING THE PHASE A CONCEPT STUDY. 1SUPPORT TEAM WEEKLY TELECONS.2RESPOND TO REQUESTS FROM THE PI IN RESOLVING QUESTIONS RELATED TO THE DESIGN AND OPERATING OF THE         TRACERS INSTRUMENT.3ASSIST THE PI TEAM IN DEVELOPING THE CONCEPT STUDY REPORT. THIS INCLUDES PROVIDING INFORMATION ON         THE ACCOMMODATIONS OF THE INSTRUMENT ON THE TRACERS SPACECRAFT.4PERFORM INSTRUMENT SYSTEMS ENGINEERING ACTIVITIES AS NEEDED TO DEVELOP PERFORMANCE, DESIGN         ENVIRONMENTAL, AND QUALITY REQUIREMENTS.5PERFORM TRADE STUDIES TO FURTHER REFINE THE INSTRUMENT CONCEPT.6PROVIDE DESIGN CONCEPT INFORMATION TO ASSESS THE COMPATIBILITY RISKS (MAGNETIC, EMI, ETC) POSED BY         EACH SYSTEM INCLUDING POWER, PROPULSION, ATTITUDE CONTROL, AND OTHER SPACECRAFT STRUCTURES.7BEGIN THE PROCESS OF DEVELOPING A DRAFT SPECIFICATION FOR THE EFI MAG BOOMS INSTRUMENT.8PREPARE AND SUBMIT INFORMAL MONTHLY TECHNICAL PROGRESS REPORT AND COST REPORT. 9PREPARE AND SUBMIT A DETAILED COST ESTIMATE/PROPOSAL FOR THE EFI MAG BOOMS INSTRUMENT TO THE         SUBSYSTEM LEVEL FOR PHASE B IAW WITH CSR REQUIREMENT CS-68, 10PREPARE AND SUBMIT A DETAILED PHASE C/D COST ESTIMATE DESCRIBED AT THE INSTRUMENT LEVEL IAW CSR         REQUIREMENT CS-69.11PREPARE AND SUBMIT A DETAILED PHASE E/F COST ESTIMATED IAW REQUIREMENT CS-70 AND CS-71 OF THE         CSR.12ATTEND THE SITE VISIT THAT NASA MAY USE AS A PART OF THE SELECTION PROCESS AT THE END OF PHASE A.
results.Sub-Awardee Name: REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA, THE

results.Sub-Award Description: UNDER THE DIRECTION OF THE TRACERS PI, LOCKHEED MARTIN ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY CENTER WILL PERFORM THE ACTIVITIES LISTED BELOW DURING THE PHASE A CONCEPT STUDY. 1SUPPORT TEAM WEEKLY TELECONS.2RESPOND TO REQUESTS FROM THE PI IN RESOLVING QUESTIONS RELATED TO THE DESIGN AND OPERATING OF THE TRACERS MISSION.3ASSIST THE PI TEAM IN DEVELOPING THE CONCEPT STUDY REPORT. 4PERFORM TRADE STUDIES TO FURTHER REFINE THE MISSION CONCEPT, IF NECESSARY.5PREPARE AND SUBMIT INFORMAL MONTHLY PROGRESS AND COST REPORT. 6PREPARE AND SUBMIT A DETAILED PHASE C/D COST ESTIMATE IAW REQUIREMENT CS-70 AND CS-71 OF THE CSR.7PREPARE AND SUBMIT A DETAILED PHASE E/F COST ESTIMATED IAW REQUIREMENT CS-70 AND CS-71 OF THE CSR.8ATTEND THE SITE VISIT THAT NASA MAY USE AS A PART OF THE SELECTION PROCESS AT THE END OF PHASE A.

messages: For searches, time period start and end dates are currently limited to an earliest date of 2007-10-01.  For data going back to 2000-10-01, use either the Custom Award Download feature on the website or one of our download or bulk_download API endpoints as listed on https://api.usaspending.gov/docs/endpoints.
